massmailing.init.template.mail.0.content:
Hello,
Your child, [NAME OF CHILD] in the [CLASSE] class was absent on this day:
​
​[SUMMARY]
​
Please provide an excuse for this absence and have it approved if you have not already.
​
​Sincerely,
​
​School Administration Office
massmailing.init.template.mail.0.name: EMAIL update
massmailing.init.template.mail.1.content:
Hello,
​
Please find below the summary for your child, [NAME OF CHILD] in the [CLASS] class:
Absence(s): [NUMBER OF ABSENCES]
Tardies: [NUMBER OF TARDIES]
​
[SUMMARY]
​
​Please contact us if you have any questions.
​
​Sincerely,
​
School Administration Office
massmailing.init.template.mail.1.name: School Administration Office Summary
massmailing.init.template.sms.0.content: Hello, your child, [NAME OF CHILD] was absent on [DATE OF LAST ABSENCE]. Please have this absence approved as soon as possible. The School Administration Office
massmailing.init.template.sms.0.name: TEXT absence update
massmailing.init.template.sms.1.content: Hello, your child, [NAME OF CHILD], was tardy on [DATE OF LAST TARDY]. Please have this tardy approved as soon as possible. School Administration Office
massmailing.init.template.sms.1.name: TEXT tardy update

massmailing.template.form.mail.descripti:
The Mass Email application automatically includes the list of events selected for mass emailing in the form of a table at the end of your message. 

You can use codes, which will be automatically replaced by the name of the student and his or her class. You can find the list of available codes in the text editor.

massmailing.template.form.sms.descriptio: A text message is limited to 160 characters. Only the date of the last absence and the last tardy can be included.
